feed.title: BIP135 implementation on Bitcoin Core available for review

entry.title: BIP135 implementation on Bitcoin Core available for review
entry.summary: Sancho has announced the completion of a Bitcoin Core implementation of BIP135. The implementation can be found at: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/10437. Sancho is soliciting for review comments and is open to discussing / answering questions about the implementation on Github or in the thread. BIP135 can be found at: https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/blob/master/bip-0135.mediawiki.
